definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: The North views Southern pamphleteering as hostile propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮認爲韓國的傳單爲惡意宣傳。

sentences.english: She faces charges of inciting racial hatred by distributing anti-semitic leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 她因散發反猶傳單而面臨着煽動種族仇恨的指控。

sentences.english: The man threw leaflets for a write-in campaign for mayor before police pulled him up and arrested him.
sentences.chinese: 這名男子一直在朝下扔傳單，爲市長的競選活動造勢。

sentences.english: I have put the first two verses of Psalm 39 on the sheet.
sentences.chinese: 在我們今天發放的傳單上，前兩節來自詩篇39篇。

sentences.english: You would drop fliers all over town. Online it's the same thing.
sentences.chinese: 業者會在鎮上廣發傳單，而網路上也是一樣。

sentences.english: The handbills said they would carry on the struggle for freedom and democracy.
sentences.chinese: 傳單說他們將繼續進行爭取自由民主的鬥爭。

sentences.english: And kind of student groups gather there to like, hand out flyers and stuffs.
sentences.chinese: 有一些學生組織聚在這裏，分發傳單之類的。

sentences.english: He is standing in front of the supermarket, passing out flyers to customers.
sentences.chinese: 他站在超市前面，向過往的路人發傳單。

sentences.english: He was sent forth to scatter the leaflets.
Then he distributed leaflets to the other assistants to explain the action program.
sentences.chinese: 然後他散發傳單給其他助手來解釋行動方案。

sentences.english: The lean man leans on the wash bean plant to read a foliage pamphlet.
sentences.chinese: 瘦人斜靠在乾淨的豆科植物上讀葉片傳單。

sentences.english: We'll produce the leaflet in large and small formats.
sentences.chinese: 我們將把傳單印成大小兩種樣式。

sentences.english: The lean man leans on the clean bean plant to read a leafleaflet.
sentences.chinese: 瘦人斜靠在乾淨的豆類植物上讀葉片傳單。

sentences.english: The part-time boy is leafleting to the people passing by.
sentences.chinese: 那個工讀生正向路過的人發傳單。

sentences.english: She produced from her pocket a bundle of handbills.
sentences.chinese: 她從口袋裏掏出一束傳單。

sentences.english: Ask workers to help pick up unsolicited flyers left on your doorstep.
sentences.chinese: 請工人們幫忙撿起門口階梯上不請自來的傳單。
